hero.subheadline: Camden's boldest tattoo and piercing studio where alternative culture meets exceptional artistry
hero.imageAlt: Tattooed artist working on custom design at Boys Don't Cry Tattoo Camden

portfolio.subtitle: Every tattoo tells a story. Here are some of our recent rebellious masterpieces.

sessions.subtitle: Professional artistry with a rebellious edge
sessions.guarantee: 100% satisfaction guarantee or we'll make it right

testimonials.quote: Alex perfectly captured my vision for a sleeve that represents my journey through music. The attention to detail is incredible.
testimonials.author: Jamie Thompson

testimonials.quote: Finally found a studio that gets alternative culture. My geometric back piece exceeded all expectations.
testimonials.author: Morgan Clarke

paragraphs: Alex Morgan has been pushing the boundaries of tattoo artistry in Camden for over 8 years. Specializing in bold, alternative designs that challenge conventions, Alex believes every tattoo should be a statement of individual rebellion against the ordinary.

From intricate blackwork to vibrant neo-traditional pieces, our studio has become Camden's go-to destination for those seeking authentic artistic expression. We don't just create tattoos - we craft personal manifestos in ink.
about.callout: Every design is completely custom - no flash, no compromises, just pure artistic rebellion.
about.imageAlt: Alex Morgan, lead tattoo artist at Boys Don't Cry Tattoo Camden

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: We recommend booking 2-4 weeks in advance for custom tattoos. Piercing appointments are often available same-day or within a few days.

items.question: What's included in the consultation?
items.answer: Every consultation includes design discussion, placement advice, sizing recommendations, and a custom sketch. We'll work together until the design perfectly captures your vision.

finalCta.headline: Ready to Express Your Rebellion?
finalCta.subheadline: Join the Camden alternative art movement. Book your consultation today.

booking.modalDescription: Ready to create something rebellious? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
booking.successMessage: We'll review your request and get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment.
booking.depositDisclaimer: A £50 deposit will be required to secure your appointment

contact.address: 123 Camden High Street, Camden, London NW1 7JN
